summary:
One of my most important attributes is my determination.  If I put my mind to something and tell myself that it is possible, I don’t rest until I’ve accomplished it.  Time and time again I prove to myself that if I put 110% of myself into doing something nothing can stop me.  Success is my goal and I will not settle for anything less.

Challenge is my motivational force in life.  When faced with a challenge I don’t see it as a challenge, instead I see it as an opportunity to learn something new and prove to myself that I am capable of conquering any goal.  

I believe that I have been successful as a student, family member, employee and member of the community because I participate with commitment, and always try to contribute in all situations and areas.

I am an adaptable person that works well with people and can turn ideas into actions.  I am good at understanding an idea and finding a way to bring it to life.  I am a solution orientated person and a firm believer being proactive and not reactive.  

Technology is the future and it is time for us to embrace it and make sure it works for us.  I believe in working hard but even more in working smart.

I believe I have grown well throughout my career and I have been groomed in a great way with many different corporate characteristics.  I look forward to continuing this growth trend with strong companies and being part of a team who takes a business to the next level.

Gallup Strengths: Achiever, Strategic, Activator, Maximizer, Futuristic

profile_positions.description:
As Distribution & DPM Manager for Europe I am responsible to support markets with achieving additional points of distribution and in store execution through the implementation of different strategies and programs. 


My role includes focus on:

- The implementation of Distributor Management Solutions to country business units (Tools, processes, etc.)
- Responsible for implementation of all learning programs for Distribution & Wholesale Managers
- Facilitate and support any Route To Market changes
- Roll Out an efficient and effective Wholesale Management Process
- Supporting markets on all topics around distribution and wholesale management
profile_positions.title: Europe Distribution Manager

profile_positions.description:
As an International Distribution & Wholesale Specialist I am responsible for all Wholesale & Distribution topics within Europe, Asia & Pacific Countries.

My role includes focus on:

 - Indirect sales and partnerships process management
 - The development and implementation of Distributor Management Solutions to country business units (Tools, processes & learning)
 - Supporting the development and implementation of all learning programs
 - Support & optimize any Route To Market changes
 - Develop & Roll Out an efficient and effective Wholesale Management Process (Global)
profile_positions.title: Global Distribution & Wholesale Specialist

profile_positions.description:
In my role as an International Field Sales Specialist I led the Global Field Sales Handheld Tool Project in which I was responsible for development, roll out, training, follow up, and support with all different markets.

My key responsibilities included:

•	Development and implementation of Global CRM application 
•	Development, implementation and training of all BI / BW reporting
•	Development of global sales KPI’s (Distribution, Share, Placements and Pricing)
•	Analysis of all executional KPI’s and board level reporting and recommendations
•	Integration of CRM handheld and Global Audit into corporate data model
•	Ensuring Sales Process & Steps of the Call are reflected/supported / integrated smartly in the tool
•	Sales systems training documentation, training and facilitation
•	Project management of all sales system’s projects with IT and business stakeholder management
•	External vendor management
profile_positions.title: Global Field Sales Specialist

profile_positions.description:
As the NFSC I was tasked with supporting the Field Sales Team across the country in achieving their objectives through smart process and plans.  I was responsible for helping ensure overall business goals and strategies are brought to life in the field.

Key Deliverables Included:

1. Roll Out of Local Mobile Solution (Field Force App) 
2. Audit setup and Maintenance to ensure correct questions which in turn build up into reports 
3. Call file/Cycle Management – overall ownership and analysis. 
4. Master Data Maintenance & Segmentation 
5. Building effective coverage plans to meet business needs 
6. Productivity – ensure field efficiency and effectiveness through effective route engineering and analysis and delivery of productivity initiatives 
7. Recording and reporting – Manage and deliver the productive recording and reporting of all Field Force Strikers, including report definition. 
8. Provide the National Field Force Manager and Regional Field Force Managers with the instruments needed to drive better in store execution. 
9. Co-ordination of Field priorities – with Field Force, DP and TM manager be responsible for the distribution of the periodic action plan/ periodic sales tools 
10. Manage and organise general field meetings on an annual basis to include imaginative, motivational content and environment. Deliver within agreed budget. 
11. Being innovative and coming up with ways of automating any Manuel Process   
12. Assisting the DP teams with training of DP Sales Staff
13. Continuous development and maintenance of the Field Force App. 
14. Working within Trade Marketing to ensure tie in of all different pillars & assist them from a Field Force viewpoint.
profile_positions.title: National Field Sales Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
As AFSM I was responsible for fostering a high performance team that met and exceed targets and budgets in our geographical territory of Off Premise (Gas Stations, Convenience, Drug Stores, Main Markets, Retail, Liquor and Retail) accounts. 

Key Deliverables included:

1. Executing sales plans in key accounts and ensuring visibility & availability at all times
2. Leading, mentoring, training & coaching Strikers within my team
3. Ensuring sales targets and plans are met & executed
4. Report on the performance of my team to our National Field Sales Manager
profile_positions.title: Regional Field Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
My role as a Striker was to develop a portfolio of Hypermarkets, Supermarkets, and Impulse accounts in a given geographical area through the implementation of agreed merchandising standards, deliver maximum distribution and availability of Red Bull products & ensure the perfect execution of defined model store standards. 

In three words it was to establish AVAILABILITY, VISIBILITY & COMMUNICATION of the Red Bull Brand in store!
profile_positions.title: Striker

profile_positions.description:
At CSIR I worked as part of team of Field Service Engineers who were responsible for the 2nd line support of all End Users on Campus. We were responsible for all IT & Mobile support for the campus, from setting up of new computers to fixing old ones whether it be software or hardware, setting up mails on the go and sorting out connectivity issues. 

We were also responsible for the roll out of various programs & solutions like Windows 7 & Printer Migration.
profile_positions.title: Field Service Engineer

profile_positions.description: Working at FNB I assisted in different roles wherever there was a need.  I was mainly tasked as Business Bank Teller which assisting all major deposits and withdrawals.  On the odd occasion I would stand in as Service Adviser which meant ensuring clients all in the correct places and know where to go as well dealt with all customer inquiries.
profile_positions.title: Various Bank Roles
